author: IGN
description:
Watch the Launch Trailer for Creature Keeper, an action-adventure RPG developed by Fervir Games. Players will tame, train, and fight alongside wild Creatures in real-time combat to build a party of charming companions to take on any challenge, then coordinate powerful attacks and combos on an action-packed, retro-inspired journey across a vast world full of dangers and secrets to discover. Creature Keeper is available now for PC (Steam).

#CreatureKeeper #IGN #Gaming
title: Creature Keeper - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
From building with toys to building with real machines in RoadCraft. Check out the latest RoadCraft trailer for this upcoming construction simulation game. RoadCraft will be available on PC, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X/S on May 20, 2025.

#Roadcraft #Gaming #IGN
title: RoadCraft - Official Sandbox Memories Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Trapped on a killer’s boat with hungry sharks circling below, a surfer must outwit a predator more dangerous than the ocean itself—will she escape, or become the next offering to the deep?

#DangerousAnimals #IGN #Movies
title: Dangerous Animals - Official Trailer (2025) Jai Courtney, Hassie Harrison

author: IGN
description:
Ready to serve the weirdest gods in Cyrodiil? In this ultimate Oblivion Remastered guide, we walk you through all 16 Daedric quests, what offerings you'll need, where to find the shrines, and the often bonkers rewards you’ll get—like soul-sucking swords, chaos staffs, and a lockpick that never breaks. Whether you're just here for Azura’s soul gem or aiming for Hermaeus Mora’s forbidden tome, we’ve got the full rundown from Level 2 to 20.

 00:00 - Intro  
00:48 - Azura  
01:43 - Sheogorath  
02:51 - Namira  
03:50 - Vaermina  
06:34 - Sanguine  
07:26 - Nocturnal  
08:04 - Peryite  
08:24 - Meridia  
09:08 - Malacath  
09:56 - Mephala  
10:46 - Hircine  
11:11 - Molag Bal  
11:51 - Boethia  
12:40 - Clavicus Vile  
13:28 - Hermaeus Mora  
15:51 - Mehrune’s Razor  
16:22 - Outro (Ogier Georick Is the GOAT!)

#TheElderScrolls4OblivionRemastered #DaedricQuests #Gaming
title: Oblivion Remastered: Daedric Quests Guide – All 16 Artifacts & Where to Find Them

author: IGN
description:
Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 is full of collectibles including journals of all the fallen expeditions that came before. Collecting each of these journals gives you a glimpse of the past expeditions as they ventured to defeat the Paintress. Here's where to find all 49 Expedition Journals to earn the Follow The Trail achievement.

0:00 Intro
0:21 Expedition 81 - Spring Meadow
0:35 Expedition 68 - Flying Waters
1:13 Expedition 52 - The Small Bourgeon
1:34 Expedition 63 - Ancient Sanctuary
2:06 Expedition 53 - Gestral Village
2:43 Expedition 66 - Esquie's Nest
3:29 Expedition 62 - The Continent
3:45 Expedition 38 - Yellow Harvest
4:29 Expedition 44 - Yellow Harvest
5:03 Expedition 59 - Yellow Harvest
6:56 Expedition 78 - Stone Wave Cliffs
7:26 Expedition 56 - Stone Wave Cliffs
8:03 Expedition 50 - Stone Wave Cliffs
8:47 Expedition 45 - Crushing Cavern
9:26 Expedition 64 - The Continent
9:45 Expedition 54 - Stone Wave Cliffs Cave
10:34 Expedition 36 - White Tree
10:55 Expedition 41 - Forgot
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 - All 49 Journal Locations

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Gameplay Trailer for Darkest Days, a free-to-play zombie RPG shooter developed by NHN. Players can explore a world suddenly impacted by a zombie outbreak. Fight to build a sanctuary, become more powerful, and do what it takes to survive. Darkest Days is available now for iOS, Android, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#DarkestDays #Gaming #IGN
title: Darkest Days - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Where did all the GTA clones go, why did nearly every company stop making them, which were the best ones, and what does the future of GTA clones look like? Let’s talk about the life, death, and hopeful future of GTA clones while we wait for the next actual GTA game to get here.

#GTA6 #IGN #Gaming
title: GTA Clones: The Life, Death, and Hopeful Future

author: IGN
description:
The true story that inspired The Exorcist. When the Church sanctions the exorcism of Emma Schmidt, two priests divided by doubt must confront a force beyond comprehension...and their own faith. Based on real events.

#TheRitual #AlPacino #Movies
title: The Ritual - Official Trailer (2025) Al Pacino, Dan Stevens, Ashley Greene

author: IGN
description:
Japanese Role Playing Games – or JRPGs are why many of us fell in love with video games. The delightful melodrama, over-the-top transformations, powerful spells, or the game that manages to buck those tropes all hold a special place in our heart. Which is why, IGN put together a list of our top 25 JRPGs with a twist. We’ve chosen to limit ourselves to a single entry in a franchise – so there’s a strong possibility that your favorite Final Fantasy, Dragon Quest, or insert franchise entry here was in contention but ultimately didn’t make it. But enough talk – let’s get to the list.

00:00 - INTRO
01:06 - 25: Shin Megami Tensei 3: Nocturne
02:15 - 24: Breath of Fire 3
03:21 - 23: Golden Sun
04:46 - 22: Ni No Kuni: Wrath of the White Witch
05:37 - 21: Lost Odyssey
06:59 - 20: Star Ocean The Second Story
07:48 - 19: Bravely Default 2
08:45 - 18: Live A Live
09:45 - 17: Tales of Vesperia
10:47 - 16: Kingdom Hearts 2
11:49 - 15: Grandia 2
12:44 - 14: Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth
13:41 - 13
title: The 25 Best JRPGs of All Time

author: IGN
description: The Audeze Maxwell wireless gaming headset delivers audiophile-grade sound, premium build quality, and versatile connectivity. But is it worth the $299 price tag? IGN’s Michael Higham discusses its planar magnetic drivers, battery life, and multi-platform support for PC, PlayStation, Xbox, and Switch.
title: Audeze Maxwell Gaming Headset Review

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Teaser Trailer for Mystery House, a 3D horror-adventure reimagining of Roberta Williams’ iconic 1980 Sierra game developed by Guillotine Games. Players will explore a dilapidated mansion to solve cryptic puzzles, make choices, and uncover a deadly secret across a haunting world. Mystery House is coming soon to PC (Steam).

#MysteryHouse #Gaming #IGN
title: Mystery House - Official Teaser Trailer
